mapper.select:
select a.REC_ID as "recId", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY as "totalTractionEnergy", a.TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY as "totalAuxiliaryEnergy", a.TOTAL_REGENERATED_ELECTRICITY as "totalRegenratedElectricity", (SELECT MAX(FILLIN_TIME) from T_TRAIN_MILEAGE b where a.EQUIP_CODE=b.EQUIP_CODE) as "fillinTime" from T_EQUIPMENT a where a.MAJOR_CODE='07'
and a.EQUIP_CODE like '%' || #{equipCode} || '%'
and a.EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #{equipName} || '%'
and (a.ORIGIN_LINE_NO=#{originLineNo} or a.USE_LINE_NO=#{originLineNo})
order by a.ORIGIN_LINE_NO,a.USE_LINE_NO,a.EQUIP_NAME asc

select a.REC_ID as "recId", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY as "totalTractionEnergy", a.TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY as "totalAuxiliaryEnergy", a.TOTAL_REGENERATED_ELECTRICITY as "totalRegenratedElectricity", (SELECT MAX(FILLIN_TIME) from T_TRAIN_MILEAGE b where a.EQUIP_CODE=b.EQUIP_CODE) as "fillinTime" from T_EQUIPMENT a where a.MAJOR_CODE='07' and a.REC_ID=#{id}

select a.REC_ID as "recId", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", a.TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY as "totalTractionEnergy", a.TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY as "totalAuxiliaryEnergy", a.TOTAL_REGENERATED_ELECTRICITY as "totalRegenratedElectricity", (SELECT MAX(FILLIN_TIME) from T_TRAIN_MILEAGE b where a.EQUIP_CODE=b.EQUIP_CODE) as "fillinTime" from T_EQUIPMENT a where a.MAJOR_CODE='07'
and a.EQUIP_CODE like '%' || #{equipCode} || '%'
and a.EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #{equipName} || '%'
and a.ORIGIN_LINE_NO=#{originLineNo}
order by a.ORIGIN_LINE_NO,a.EQUIP_NAME asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TRAIN_MILEAGE (REC_ID, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, TOTAL_MILES, MILES_INCREMENT, FILLIN_TIME, FILLIN_USER_ID, REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, ARCHIVE_FLAG, REC_STATUS, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY , TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY , TOTAL_REGENERATED_ELECTRICITY, TRACTION_INCREMENT, AUXILIARY_INCREMENT, REGENERATED_INCREMENT) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalMiles,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{milesIncrement,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fillinTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fillinUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recRevisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recReviseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeletor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recDeleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{archiveFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTractionEnergy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{totalAuxiliaryEnergy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{totalRegenratedElectricity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tractionIncrement,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{auxiliaryIncrement,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regenratedIncrement,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT tm.REC_ID as "recId", tm.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", tm.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", tm.TOTAL_MILES as "totalMiles", tm.MILES_INCREMENT as "milesIncrement", tm.FILLIN_TIME as "fillinTime", tm.FILLIN_USER_ID as "fillinUserId", u.NAME as "fillinUserName", tm.REMARK as "remark", tm.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", tm.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", tm.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", tm.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", tm.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", tm.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", tm.TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY as "totalTractionEnergy", tm.TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY as "totalAuxiliaryEnergy", tm.TOTAL_REGENERATED_ELECTRICITY as "totalRegenratedElectricity", tm.TRACTION_INCREMENT as "tractionIncrement", tm.AUXILIARY_INCREMENT as "auxiliaryIncrement", tm.REGENERATED_INCREMENT as "regenratedIncrement", tm.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", tm.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", tm.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", tm.EXT1 as "ext1", tm.EXT2 as "ext2", tm.EXT3 as "ext3", tm.EXT4 as "ext4", tm.EXT5 as "ext5" FROM T_TRAIN_MILEAGE tm left join SYS_USER u on u.ID=FILLIN_USER_ID WHERE tm.REC_ID = #{id}

SELECT REC_ID, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, "DAY", DAILY_WORK_MILE, TOTAL_WORK_MILE, DAILY_MILE, TOTAL_MILE, TRACTION_INCREMENT, TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY, AUXILIARY_INCREMENT, TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY, REGENRATED_INCREMENT, TOTAL_REGENRATED_ELECTRICITY, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, REMARK FROM T_TARIN_MILE WHERE DELETE_FLAG='0' AND REC_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TARIN_MILE ( REC_ID, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, "DAY", DAILY_WORK_MILE, TOTAL_WORK_MILE, DAILY_MILE, TOTAL_MILE, TRACTION_INCREMENT, TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY, AUXILIARY_INCREMENT, TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY, REGENRATED_INCREMENT, TOTAL_REGENRATED_ELECTRICITY, REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyWorkMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalWorkMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dailyMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tractionIncrement,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalTractionEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auxiliaryIncrement,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAuxiliaryEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regenratedIncrement,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalRegenratedElectricity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_TARIN_MILE SET
EQUIP_CODE = #{equipCode},
EQUIP_NAME = #{equipName},
"DAY" = #{day},
DAILY_WORK_MILE = #{dailyWorkMile},
TOTAL_WORK_MILE = #{totalWorkMile},
DAILY_MILE = #{dailyMile},
TOTAL_MILE = #{totalMile},
TRACTION_INCREMENT = #{tractionIncrement},
TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY = #{totalTractionEnergy},
AUXILIARY_INCREMENT = #{auxiliaryIncrement},
TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY = #{totalAuxiliaryEnergy},
REGENRATED_INCREMENT = #{regenratedIncrement},
TOTAL_REGENRATED_ELECTRICITY = #{totalRegenratedElectricity},
REMARK = #{remark},
REC_REVISOR = #{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME = #{recReviseTime} where REC_ID = #{recId}
mapper.select:
SELECT REC_ID, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, "DAY", DAILY_WORK_MILE, TOTAL_WORK_MILE, DAILY_MILE, TOTAL_MILE, TRACTION_INCREMENT, TOTAL_TRACTION_ENERGY, AUXILIARY_INCREMENT, TOTAL_AUXILIARY_ENERGY, REGENRATED_INCREMENT, TOTAL_REGENRATED_ELECTRICITY, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, REC_REVISOR, REC_REVISE_TIME, REC_DELETOR, REC_DELETE_TIME, DELETE_FLAG, REMARK FROM T_TARIN_MILE WHERE DELETE_FLAG='0'
AND "DAY"=TO_DATE(#{day}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode}
order by "DAY" desc
mapper.insert:
insert ALL
INTO T_TARIN_MILE ( REC_ID, EQUIP_CODE, EQUIP_NAME, "DAY", DAILY_WORK_MILE, TOTAL_WORK_MILE, REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME) VALUES ( #{mile.recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.dailyWorkMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mile.totalWorkMile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mile.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mile.recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT * FROM dual
